text: 3.12: Stt 4.8; Hi 11.4; Zu 1.11Nza Kein farar muuŋgip kɨ thari. Ana Satan guma ma, ana maaŋ muuŋgiap, nduara won ŋguga shogim, ana rimgi. Ana ram muuŋgi ne nzuav won ŋguga shogim, ana rimgi? Ana khueŋ nzuav ana shogim, ana rimgi. Ana ŋguk tɨv nzerigi, anan tɨv mbatɨgi. Ana ne nzuav ana shogim, ana rimgi.
